title: RNB Fridays Live
text: RNB Fridays Live is an annual concert series held in <a href="Australia">Australia</a>. The series was co-founded by the <a href="Hit%20Network">Hit Radio Network</a> and <a href="Frontier%20Touring%20Company">Frontier Touring</a> in 2016. The event features several stages featuring musical artists from many <a href="Music%20genre">genres of music</a>, including <a href="Rhythm%20and%20blues">R&B</a>, <a href="Hip%20hop%20music">hip hop</a>, <a href="electronic%20dance%20music">electronic dance music</a>, and pop. The concert series are held in venues across major cities in Australia. The shows are hosted by <a href="Fatman%20Scoop">Fatman Scoop</a>, with DJ Horizon as the resident DJ.
